title: Subpart 380-2 - Eligibility
content:
Subpart 380-2 - Eligibility

State Regulations
§ 380-2.1 - Providing care
§ 380-2.2 - Leave for birth, adoption, or foster care
§ 380-2.3 - Leave for qualifying exigency arising from the service of a family member in the armed forces of the United States
§ 380-2.4 - Family leave on or after January 1, 2018
§ 380-2.5 - Employees Who Acquire Eligibility During Employment
§ 380-2.6 - Family leave waiver
§ 380-2.7 - Bonding leave for those born or placed prior to January 1, 2018
§ 380-2.8 - Fifty-two consecutive weeks
§ 380-2.9 - Employees subject to collective bargaining agreements

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
